resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/168491</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>168491</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_105681</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_105681</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sulphur-oxygen reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwefel-Sauerstoff Reaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction du Soufre-oxygène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reação do Enxôfre-oxigênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazione dell'Zolfo-ossigeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση θείο-οξυγόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reacción del Sulfuro-oxi'geno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three word equations showing an incorrect way to describe the chemical reaction between sulphur and oxygen.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sulphur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphur dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">word equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Wortgleichungen, die eine falsche
Methode zeigen, die chemische Reaktion zwischen Schwefel und 
Sauerstoff zu beschreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois équations de mot montrant une 
voie incorrecte de décrire la réaction chimique entre le soufre et 
l'oxygène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três equações da palavra que 
mostram uma maneira incorreta descrever a reação química entre o 
enxôfre e o oxigênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre equazioni di parola che 
mostrano un modo errato descrivere la reazione chimica fra zolfo ed 
ossigeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών εξισώσεων λέξης που εμφανίζουν ανακριβή 
τρόπο να περιγραφεί η χημική αντίδραση μεταξύ του θείου και του 
οξυγόνου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ecuaciones de la palabra que 
muestran una manera incorrecta de describir la reacción química 
entre el sulfuro y el oxígeno.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sauerstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwefel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwefeldioxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortgleichung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction chimique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'oxygène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soufre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">anhydride sulfureux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équation de mot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reação química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oxigênio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enxôfre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dióxido de enxôfre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equação da palavra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazione chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ossigeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zolfo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anidride solforosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equazione di parola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημική αντίδραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οξυγόνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θείο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διοξείδιο του θείου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξίσωση λέξης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reacción química</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">oxígeno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sulfuro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dióxido de sulfuro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ecuación de la palabra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
